dxf2svg.util
Class RelativeLimitsFrame

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.util.RelativeLimitsFrame
public class RelativeLimitsFrame
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a rectangular frame by which and object can query if another object falls within its bounderies. All calculations are based on SVG space (0,0 at top left).

Version:
0.01 - March 17, 2005
Author:
Andrew Nisbet

          This method returns true if the point described by the x and y values is on or inside the limits rectangle, and false otherwise.
